title: Community Service & Leadership
text:
Local Food Bank
Volunteered for over 100 hours, assisting in food distribution and organizing community events to raise awareness about food insecurity.
Youth Mentorship Program
Actively participated in mentoring high school students, providing guidance on academic and career choices.





Event Coordinator, Annual Charity Run
Led a team of volunteers to organize a charity run that raised over $5,000 for local charities. Responsibilities included logistics, marketing, and participant engagement.
President, Community Service Club
Oversaw club activities, organized community service projects, and collaborated with local organizations to enhance community outreach.




Through these initiatives, I have developed strong leadership skills, a commitment to community engagement, and a passion for making a positive impact in the lives of others.

ğŸ“ Objective: Visualize and analyze patterns in Toronto fire incidents by neighborhood, time, and cause.
ğŸ“Š Tool Used: Tableau Public
ğŸ§  Insights:

Downtown areas had the highest frequency of incidents.
Cooking-related fires were the most common residential cause.
Spike in winter months linked to heating appliances.
